item.title: Folk playlist for 9/2017
item.description: Including: 500 Miles, Carolina Choclate Drops, Dolly Parton, Glen Hansard, I Will Rise, Leadbelly, Myrkur, Old Man Luedecke, Phil Ochs, The Stanley Brothers.

item.title: Folk playlist for 8/2017
item.description: Including: Doc Watson, Fairport Convention, Gillian Welch, Guy Clark, I Shall Not Be Moved, John Prine Covering, John Reilly & Friends, Neil Young, The Bombadils, The Lily Of The West.

item.title: Folk playlist for 7/2017
item.description: Including: Frank Fairfield, Gordon Lightfoot, Jim Croce, Johnny, I Hardly Knew Ye, Mandolin Orange, Metallica, Nick Drake, Rhiannon Giddens, The Band, Woody Guthrie.

item.title: Folk playlist for 6/2017
item.description: Including: Faux Reality, Kingston Trio, Nathan Rogers, Pastures Of Plenty, Pete Seeger, Stan Rogers, Terence Ryan, The Decemberists, The Down Hill Strugglers, Unstoppable.

item.title: Folk playlist for 5/2017
item.description: Including: Big Black Car, Kaan Akin, Neil Young, Phil Ochs, Raymond Crooke, Spicey Man, The Be Good Tanyas, The Frames, The Secret Sisters, Woody Guthrie.

item.title: Folk playlist for 4/2017
item.description: Including: Bob Dylan, Hugh Scanlon, Jack Derus, Jaimee Harris, Joe Pug, Mipso, Pentangle, Sandy Denny, Songs: Ohia, The Cody Sisters.

item.title: Folk playlist for 3/2017
item.description: Including: Andy Bailey, Bob Dylan, Broadripple Is Burning, Christopher Paul Stelling, Crosby, Stills & Nash, Joan Baez, Johnny Flynn, Kaan Akin, Kaleo, The Dubliners.

item.title: Folk playlist for 2/2017
item.description: Including: Dougie Maclean, John Garrett, John Lensing, Johnny Cash, Johnny Flynn, Justin Vernon, Koeeoaddi There, Post Malone, The Creak, Villages.

item.title: Folk playlist for 1/2017
item.description: Including: Arthur Mcbride, Cisco Houston, Dick Gaughan, Doc Watson, Exuma, Jackson C. Frank, Lord Huron, Salonika, The Mamas &Amp; The Papas, Townes Van Zandt.
